titleStmt.title: Amaryllis to Tityrus being the first heroick harangue of the excellent pen of Monsieur Scvdery, a witty and pleasant novel / Englished by a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Scudéry, Madeleine de, 1607-1701.
Person of honour.

notesStmt.note: Amaryllis to Tityrus is part of Les femmes illustres, variously attributed to Madeleine de Scudéry and to her brother Georges. Cf. information in notes in Bib. nat. and NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
